Seishun Buta Yarou Restaurant

Ramen

Ramen is a Japanese noodle soup dish. It consists of Chinese wheat noodles served in a meat or (occasionally) fish-based broth, often flavored with soy sauce or miso, and uses toppings such as sliced pork (叉焼 chāshū), dried seaweed (海苔 nori), kamaboko, and green onions.

Sushi

Sushi is a Japanese dish of prepared vinegared rice, usually with some sugar and salt, accompanying a variety of ingredients, such as seafood, often raw, and vegetables. Styles of sushi and its presentation vary widely, but the one key ingredient is "sushi rice", also referred to as shari, or sumeshi.

Sashimi

Sashimi is a Japanese dish of sliced raw fish or other meat. It is usually served with condiments such as soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger. Sashimi is often served as an appetizer, but it can be a meal in itself. It is also a common component of bento boxes.
